data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XVIII. Status of subgenera Palaeoconnus Franz and Heterotetramelus Franz (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2018): Taxonomy of ' Euconnus complex'. Part XVIII. Status of subgenera Palaeoconnus Franz and Heterotetramelus Franz (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4524 (5): 567-580, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.5.4
